projects.title: Portfolio Blog CMS
projects.description: This is portfolio blog CMS, I sign in and create and edit comments and posts of my blog. Done with React.

projects.title: Portfolio Blog API
projects.description: This is the backend of my Portfolio Blog, a RESTful API, it has CRUD operations for posts and comments, and user authentication. Done with Express & NodeJS.

projects.title: Members Only
projects.description: In this project I give users different abilities and permissions, done to practice authentication with passportJS and username & password auth. Created with Express, NodeJS and hosted on Heroku

projects.title: Inventory Application
projects.description: Project done to learn Express, Pug, Mongoose and Sass along the way, implemented CRUD methods for items and categories. You can create, read, update and delete them.

projects.title: Mini Message Board
projects.description: Basic message board app, you can write messages. Written in Express, NodeJS using MongoDB, Mongoose and Pug.

projects.title: The Movie Database Clone
projects.description: A usable and dynamic TMDB clone, using the TMDB Oficial API, you can search movies, tv shows, people, sign up and rate movies, add movies to watchlist and more. Created with React and Firebase.

projects.title: Where's Waldo
projects.description: The classic where's waldo game, you gotta find 3 characters in each map, can send score and time to leaderboards. Created with React and Firebase.

projects.title: CV Project
projects.description: A simple CV application, you can fill experience forms, add more experience, delete some and save it. Done with React

projects.title: Shopping Cart
projects.description: A Casio watches page, you can buy watches in shop, order them in the cart. Done with React and Jest.

projects.title: Memory Card Game
projects.description: A memory game, done with the Simpsons style, you gotta pick every card, but if you repeat a card you lose, get to 12 of score and win.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: (Click the button don't press enter), you can search cities, get the weather info and a Gif related. Done with Open Weather and Giphy APIs, JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Library App
projects.description: A simple Library, you can add and remove books, toggle if readed or not. Done with JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: To-Do List
projects.description: A To-Do List (Task Management) app, you can create projects, and tasks for each project, set priorities, add notes, description, titles, due dates. Done with JavaScript, HTML, CSS and LocalStorage.

projects.title: Restaurant Page
projects.description: A simple Restaurant page, see popular foods from Argentina's Gastronomy. Done with JavaScript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: A simple Tic Tac Toe game, completely usable and functional, done with HTML, CSS and JavaScript

projects.title: Dashboard Project
projects.description: A simple dashboard, not usable, done to practice HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: A simple calculator, able to sum, minus, multiply, divide and use comma. Done with Javascript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Etch a Sketch
projects.description: Simple grid drawing app, change grid size, pencil color and saturation. Done with Javascript, HTML and CSS.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors
projects.description: A very simple rock paper scissors game. Done with Javascript, HTML and CSS.
